content.html:
A really annoying fact (that isn't GPD's fault) is that it's just too big to by-pass the ban on larger electronic devices in carry-on bags that the UK enforces on flights to/from Middle Eastern destinations — 180mm long rather than 160mm, and a couple of mm too thick.

The reason this may be relevant is that the US DHS is considering extending the ban to flights between the UK and USA. (A just slightly smaller GPD Pocket would suddenly have a captive market in the shape of frequent flyer business folks ...)
